sentences.en: A Giant, snow - white in colour and gleaming bright, will beget a radiant people.
sentences.cn: 一位巨人, 雪白的肤色,闪烁着明亮的光, 会产生发光的人.

sentences.en: Dragons Beget dragons , phoenixes Beget phoenixes.
Dragons beget dragons, phoenixes beget phoenixes.

sentences.cn: 经济紧张导致政治紧张。

sentences.en: Evil deeds may beget many fateful consequences.
sentences.cn: 恶行会产生严重的后果.

sentences.en: Flattery bring friend, but the truth beget enmity.
sentences.cn: 谄言交友, 直言树敌.

sentences.en: Great love will beget great faith.
sentences.cn: 大的爱就产生大的信心.

sentences.en: He wanted to beget an heir.
Health and cheerfulness beget each other.
sentences.cn: 健康和快乐是互相联系的.

sentences.en: Health and cheerfulness mutually beget each ot IT.
Health and cheerfulness mutually beget each other.
Life on Earth alters Earth to beget more life.
sentences.cn: 地球上的生命改变着地球以产生更多生命.

sentences.en: Swine flu rages . Nukes proliferate . Bailouts beget bailouts.
sentences.cn: 猪流感肆掠、核武器扩散、救助者在求救.

words.tran_cn: 产生；招致；引起；当…的父亲

trans.tran_cn: (书面语) 招致, 产生, 引起
trans.tran_en: to cause something or make it happen
to become the father of a child
